Author: akira0245, Ori
Name: MidiBard 2
Description:
Bard performance using midi files or keyboard.
- Solo and ensemble mode support
- Text commands for instrument equip and switch
Supported by FFXIV Bards & Bands Community: discord.gg/ff14bard
Punchline:
Bard performance using midi files or keyboard.
Supported by FFXIV Bards & Bands Community: discord.gg/ff14bard
Changelog:
+ New playback method, now your songs play even better! (You may still fall back to the legacy method in settings.)
+ Use regex to search for the song.
+ Now also shows the duration of the playlist.
+ Indicator on track visualization works more precisely.
